description:
This liquid wax penetrates your base quickly with good adhesion, and suits dry snow conditions and temperatures between -3 and 0 degrees.

  • Liquid paraffin wax suits dry snow with humidity less than 30%
  • Hot or cold application lets you wax at home or at the track without an iron
  • Suitable for training and racing
name: Maplus BP1 Liquid Paraffin Glide Wax (-3 to 0C) - Unisex
